Versandkosten Lieferzeit: 3-7 Werktage* Art Produkts: Creme Verwendungszweck: Ausgleichende Feuchtigkeitscreme für Hauttyp Sanumgerman Beschreibung: • verleiht gepflegtes Aussehen strahlenden Teint • spendet Feuchtigkeit für empfindliche Haut geeignet • enthält Germanium, Nachtkerzenöl, Allantoin, Vitamin E Panthenol Didier® Hautcreme Germanium hochwertige Feuchtigkeitscreme Tages- Nachtpflege für Hauttyp eignet insbesondere für reife empfindliche Haut. Die Kombination Sanumgerman Nachtkerzenöl Haut straffenden Feuchtigkeit spendenden Eigenschaften sorgt für Kräftigung Hautstruktur. Wertvolle Zusätze Vitamin E, Allantoin Panthenol runden perfekte Dosierung ausgleichenden Pflegecreme ab. Die fettende, zart schmelzende Creme Haut glatt geschmeidig verleiht strahlendes Aussehen. Zur Steigerung pflegenden Wirkung empfehlen zusätzlich Verwendung Didier® Badeperlen Germanium . Zur Steigerung pflegenden Wirkung empfehlen zusätzlich Verwendung Didier® Badeperlen Germanium. Anwendung: Morgens abends sparsam Gesicht, Hals Dekolleté auftragen sanft einmassieren. Hinweis: Parfum Inhaltsstoffe: Aqua (Water), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetearyl Alcohol, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Oenothera Biennis (Eyening Primrose) Oil, Germanium-Citrate-Lactate Powder, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Caprylate, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Levulinate, Levulinic Acid, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Phytate, Alcohol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate. Stressfaktoren, unausgewogene Ernährung, Infektionen Medikamenteneinnahme können Darmflora Gleichgewicht bringen. Probiotische Kulturen dafür Herstellung intakten Darmflora unterstützen. Wichtiger Hinweis: Die Einnahme PROBIKEHL® Ersatz für abwechslungsreiche ausgewogene Ernährung gesunde Lebensweise. Die angegebene Tagesdosis überschreiten. Für Kinder unzugänglich aufbewahren. Hinweis: Unsere ätherischen fetten Öle kontrolliert biologischem Anbau (kbA) höchster Qualität. Darauf bezüglich Wahl Herkunftslandes Wert gelegt, Sortiment bewusst knapp gehalten. Aufgrund Lieferengpässen Ernteausfällen Ausnahmefällen Land gewechselt werden. Als Trägeröl bieten Jojobaöl an. KG Herstellung Vertrieb diätetischen, kosmetischen pharmazeutischen Produkten » Home Login / Register | Your account | Shopping Cart | Cash box Search Literature Products Cosmetics Dietary Supplement Essential/fatty oils Shipping & Returns Privacy Notice General terms and conditions Imprint Contact Right of revocation Standard withdrawal form Newsletter Biofrid Cosmetic GmbH & Co.KG Hasseler Steinweg 9 27318 Hoya Postfach 1355 27316 Hoya Telefon 04251 9352-396 Telefax 04251 9352-290 Social Bookmarks Right of revocation Consumers are entitled to right of withdrawal according to the following conditions, wherein the consumer is defined as every natural person entering into legal transaction for purpose attributed neither to commercial nor self-employed occupational activity: Returns policy Right of revocation Right of withdrawal You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days, without stating any reasons. The withdrawal period is fourteen days beginning the day on which you or third party designated by you, other than the carrier, have/has taken possession of the goods. In order to exercise your right of withdrawal, you have to notify us - Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG, Hasseler Steinweg 9, 27318 Hoya; Tel.: 04251/9352-395; Fax: 04251/9352-290; info@biofrid.de - by way of explicit declaration (e.g. letter sent by post, fax or e-mail) of your decision to withdraw from this contract. To this end you may use the attached standard withdrawal form, though this is not required. You may fill and submit the standard withdrawal form, or any other explicit declaration, electronically on our website www.mastavit.de. If you make use of this option, we communicate (e.g. via e-mail) acknowledgement of receipt of such withdrawal without delay. To observe the withdrawal period it is sufficient, if you send off the notice regarding the exercising of the right of withdrawal before the expiry of the withdrawal period. Consequences of the withdrawal If you withdraw from this contract, we reimburse all payments we have received from you including shipping charges (with the exception of additional charges which result from your choosing shipping method different from the cheapest standard shipping method offered by us), without delay and no later than fourteen days from the day that the notice of your withdrawal from this contract received by us. For this refund, we use the same payment method which used by you the original transaction, unless we explicitly made other arrangements with you. In no case you be charged any fees for this refund. We may refuse the reimbursement until we have received back the goods or until you have provided proof that the goods have been sent, depending on which ever occurs first. The goods must be returned to us without delay and any case no later fourteen days after the date that you notified us of your withdrawal from this contract. To observe this deadline, the goods must be sent off before the expiry of the fourteen day period. You shall bear the immediate cost for the returning of the goods. You shall only be liable for any diminished value of the goods resulting from the handling other than what is necessary order to ascertain the nature, characteristics and functioning of the goods. End of the revocation notice Exclusion of the right of revocation The right of revocation does not apply to distance sales contracts on the delivery of audio or video recordings or of software, if you have unsealed the delivered data medium. General remarks 1. Please avoid damaging or soiling of the goods. Please return the goods to us, if possible, their entire original packaging and together with all accessories. Use, if necessary, protective outer packaging. Should you not have the original packaging at your disposal any more, please use appropriate packaging to protect the goods against transport damages. 2. Please note that the aforementioned clause 1 do not constitute requirement for the effective exercise of your right of revocation. Print this page Standard withdrawal form (If you wish to withdraw from the contract, please fill out this form and send it back.) - To Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG, Managing Directors: Reiner Kehlbeck, Heinfried Kehlbeck, Natascha Kehlbeck, Martin Stannat, Hasseler Steinweg 9, 27318 Hoya, Fax: +49(0)4251/9352-290, e-mail: info@biofrid.de - I/We(*) hereby give notice that I/We (*) withdraw from my/our (*) contract of sale of the following goods (*)/provision of the following service (*). - Ordered on (*)/ received on (*) - Name of consumer(s) - Address of consumer(s) - Signature of consumer(s) (only case of paper version) - Date (*) Delete as appropriate Powered by First-Web * Gilt für Lieferungen Deutschland. General terms and conditions - Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG Herstellung Vertrieb diätetischen, kosmetischen pharmazeutischen Produkten » Home Login / Register | Your account | Shopping Cart | Cash box Search Literature Products Cosmetics Dietary Supplement Essential/fatty oils Shipping & Returns Privacy Notice General terms and conditions Imprint Contact Right of revocation Standard withdrawal form Newsletter Biofrid Cosmetic GmbH & Co.KG Hasseler Steinweg 9 27318 Hoya Postfach 1355 27316 Hoya Telefon 04251 9352-396 Telefax 04251 9352-290 Social Bookmarks General terms and conditions General terms and conditions § 1 Scope of application The following General Terms and Conditions as defined at the time order is placed shall apply exclusively to all business relations with the purchaser for orders via the internet shop. § 2 Conclusion of contract The presentation of our products our web presence comprises merely invitation to the customer to submit contract offer. By placing his order, the customer submits offer within the meaning of §145 German Civil Code (BGB, Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch). The customer receive email confirming receipt of the order. If necessary, we inform the customer about potential errors the specifications of the product range on our website and present corresponding counteroffer to the customer. The customer waives the receipt of declaration of acceptance, §141 para. 1 German Civil Code. The contract with us is concluded, if we accept the offer of the customer within 10 days writing or text form or deliver the ordered goods, or if the customer pays advance. In the case of advance payment, we declare acceptance of the contract upon the customer’s advance payment, if this payment is made within 10 days of placing the order. § 3 Bearing of the shipping costs if the right of withdrawal is exercised: If the right of withdrawal is exercised, we reimburse all payments we have received from you including shipping charges (with the exception of additional charges which result from your choosing shipping method different from the cheapest standard shipping method offered by us), without delay and no later than fourteen days from the day that the notice of your withdrawal from this contract received by us. For this refund, we use the same payment method which used by you the original transaction, unless we explicitly made other arrangements with you. In no case you be charged any fees for this refund. We may refuse the reimbursement until we have received back the goods or until you have provided proof that the goods have been sent, depending on which ever occurs first. You shall bear the immediate cost for the returning of the goods. § 4 Delivery, Delivery costs, Risk transfer The goods are shipped at the delivery costs listed for each individual case. Provided that the customer is consumer, we bear the shipping risk regardless of the mode of shipment any case. If the customer is business, all risks and dangers of shipment are transferred to the customer, as soon as we have handed over the goods to the assigned forwarding agent. § 5 Retention of Title The delivered goods shall remain our property until full payment of the purchase price has been received. § 6 Warranty Warranty is subject to the legal regulations. § 7 Consumer information regarding distance sales contracts on the purchase of goods We are not subject to special and not aforementioned codes of conduct. Any input errors your order can be detected at the final confirmation before check-out and corrected at any time by means of the deleting and changing feature before final placement of the order. For the essential characteristics of the products presented by us as well as the period of validity for restricted offers, please refer to the individual product descriptions on our web site. German is the exclusive language offered for the conclusion of the contract. Complaints and warranty claims can be submitted to the address as stated at supplier information. To print the contract text, please use the print function of your browser. The contract text is not available to customers for orders our web shop. Further, the contract text is saved by us. For information on payment, delivery or fulfillment, please refer to the offer itself. After conclusion of the contract, you receive automatic e-mail containing further information on the processing of the contract. The e-mail comprises order number, which has to be quoted the bank transfer of the invoice amount due. As rule, this order number not correspond to the invoice number. § 8 Miscellaneous The contractual relationships with the customer as well as the respective general terms and conditions are governed exclusively by the law of the Federal Republic of Germany. Provided that the customer is consumer, the valid legal provisions and rights the country of residence of the customer existing favour of the consumer not be affected or impaired by this agreement. Application of the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods (CISG) is excluded. The exclusive place of jurisdiction is the court of our place of business if the customer is merchant the sense of the German Commercial Code or corporation under public law. We are entitled to take action at the court of the customer. § 9 Severability Clause If individual clauses of this contract are or become totally or partially invalid, this not affect the validity of the remaining parts of the contract. Die angebotenen genuinen ätherischen Öle aufgrund Vielzahl einzigen Pflanze enthaltenen Duftstoffe umfassendes Bouquet. Darauf bezüglich Wahl Herkunftslandes Wert gelegt, Sortiment bewusst knapp gehalten. Aufgrund Lieferengpässen Ernteausfällen Ausnahmefällen Land gewechselt werden. Als Trägeröl bieten Jojobaöl an. Origin: Italy Type of product: Essential oil from controlled organic crops Description: This oil has strong top note because of its crisp, fresh and stimulating fragrance. It clears up the air with its fresh scent and is especially stimulating when evaporated together with water. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Origin: Italy Type of product: Essential oil from controlled organic crops Description: This oil has strong top note because of its crisp, fresh and stimulating fragrance. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Shipping costs Shipping time: 3-7 working days* Food Supplement with Omega-6-fatty acids Ingredients Evening primrose oil (73,8%), Gelatine, Humectant: Glycerine, Water, DL-alpha-Tocopherol Contents: 27 (40 Capsules) Recommended intake: to be taken thrice daily 2 capsules at mealtimes Health Claim(s) Linoleic acid contributes to the maintenance of normal blood cholesterol levels Notice The evening primrose contains polyunsaturated fatty acids which human beings need to get from their food. The oil of its seeds contains linoleic acid and gamma-linoleic acid. The body requires these polyunsaturated fatty acids when it is especially burdened, mainly as building blocks of the cell membranes. A positive effect is only achieved above 10 of linoleic acid. It is the high content of gamma-linoleic acid what distinguishes the evening primrose oil comparison with other commonly used edible fats. This food supplement is not replacement for diversified and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. Keep away from children. When used by schizophrenic patients or with the intake of epileptogenic medication (e.g. Phenothiazine) epileptic seizures may occur. In those cases and during pregnancy consult your physician. Shipping costs Shipping time: 3-7 working days* Origin: Morocco Type of product: Essential oil from controlled organic crops Description: The wood from which the essential oil is obtained leaves strong traces the fragrance of the oil. It is woody, balmy and warm. When placed room, the fragrance provides balancing and stabilizing atmosphere, giving feeling of calm and warmth. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Being spicy, sweet and pleasantly mild, it has warming, stimulating and inspiring effect, at the same time conveying feeling of pleasant warmth. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Being spicy, sweet and pleasantly mild, it has warming, stimulating and inspiring effect, at the same time conveying feeling of pleasant warmth. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Hinweis: Unsere ätherischen fetten Öle kontrolliert biologischem Anbau (kbA) höchster Qualität. Es handelt flüchtige, hochkonzentrierte, ölige Substanzen, unterschiedlichen Herstellungsverfahren - Wasserdampfdestillation kalte Pressung - verschiedenen Pflanzenteilen gewonnen werden. Sie zumeist farblos hinterlassen Regel (außer Kaltpressung) sichtbaren Spuren, verflüchtigt haben. Diese ätherischen Öle 100% naturrein. Der Einsatz ätherischer Öle sparsam bewusst geschehen. Sie dienen Raumbeduftung Luftverbesserung. Sie dürfen unverdünnt Haut Schleimhäuten Kontakt gebracht werden, Reizungen führen können. In Schwangerschaft Kindern besondere Vorsicht geboten. Die angebotenen genuinen ätherischen Öle aufgrund Vielzahl einzigen Pflanze enthaltenen Duftstoffe umfassendes Bouquet. Darauf bezüglich Wahl Herkunftslandes Wert gelegt, Sortiment bewusst knapp gehalten. Aufgrund Lieferengpässen Ernteausfällen Ausnahmefällen Land gewechselt werden. Als Trägeröl bieten Jojobaöl an. Shipping costs Shipping time: 3-7 working days* Origin: Italy Type of product: Essential oil from controlled organic crops Description: The essential oil is obtained from the fruit peel and is cold-pressed. It has refreshing, light and pleasantly stimulating effect and is excellently suitable to lift moods. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Alopecia areata) Notice Zinc is of central importance for the normal development and function of the skin and the integumentary appendage. The trace element Zinc is component of numerous vital enzymes and is required for the function of several hormones. As the body cannot produce zinc and store it for long periods, it should be included healthy and balanced diet. Zinc works as antioxidant the body and defends it from free radicals. Zinc is organically bound Zinc gluconate and is well tolerated. Zinc-diet is for adults only and as additional balanced diet is only to be used under medical supervision. Because there is no experience with pregnant and breastfeeding women, this group should note use Zinc-diet. Zinc-diet is not to be taken cases of heavy injury to the renal parenchyma and acute kidney failure. This dietary supplement is not replacement for diversified and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. Keep away from children. Shipping costs Shipping time: 3-7 working days* Dietary Supplement Ingredients (of 100g): 69.4 of L-arginine, stabilizer sorbitol, separating agent magnesium-salts of fatty acids, 138 mg of pyridoxine hydrochloride, 18.5 mg of folic acid, 0.2 mg of cyanocobalamin Contents: 28,8 (40 Tablets) 72,0 (100 Tablets) Recommended intake: 3 times day 2 tablets to be taken with meal. Purpose For dietary treatment of arteriosclerosis and increased homocysteine levels by supply of L-arginine, folic acid, vitamin B6, and vitamin B12 Notice With Arginin-diet Biofrid, Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG provides product containing the amino acid L-arginine, folic acid, vitamin B6, and vitamin B12. Arginin-diet Biofrid is dietary food for special medical purposes (balanced diet) for dietary treatment of arteriosclerosis and increased homocysteine levels. Folic acid, vitamin B12, and vitamin B6 contribute to normal homocysteine metabolism. With the help of folic acid and vitamin B12, homocysteine is either broken down to methionine, or interaction with vitamin B6, to the amino acid cysteine. Important note: Arginin-diet Biofrid is intended for adults and, being supplemental balanced diet, has to be used under medical supervision. Arginin-diet Biofrid must not be used cases of severe cardiovascular diseases. Since there is no experience available with pregnant or lactating women and children, use by this group of persons is not advisable. Since coating of the tablets dispensed with, the tablets have to be kept protected from light within their blister, and to be taken out immediately before consumption. This dietary food is not substitute for varied and balanced diet and healthy way of living. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. Keep away from small children. Versandkosten Lieferzeit: 3-7 Werktage* Herkunft: Marokko Art Produkts: Ätherisches Öl kontrolliert biologischem Anbau (kbA) Beschreibung: Das Holz, ätherische Öl gewonnen wird, hinterlässt starke Spuren Duft Öles. Er holzig, balsamisch warm. Bei Raumbeduftung schafft ausgleichende stabilisierende Atmosphäre, Gefühl Ruhe Geborgenheit aufkommt. Hinweis: Unsere ätherischen fetten Öle kontrolliert biologischem Anbau (kbA) höchster Qualität. Es handelt flüchtige, hochkonzentrierte, ölige Substanzen, unterschiedlichen Herstellungsverfahren - Wasserdampfdestillation kalte Pressung - verschiedenen Pflanzenteilen gewonnen werden. Sie zumeist farblos hinterlassen Regel (außer Kaltpressung) sichtbaren Spuren, verflüchtigt haben. Diese ätherischen Öle 100% naturrein. Der Einsatz ätherischer Öle sparsam bewusst geschehen. Sie dienen Raumbeduftung Luftverbesserung. Sie dürfen unverdünnt Haut Schleimhäuten Kontakt gebracht werden, Reizungen führen können. In Schwangerschaft Kindern besondere Vorsicht geboten. Die angebotenen genuinen ätherischen Öle aufgrund Vielzahl einzigen Pflanze enthaltenen Duftstoffe umfassendes Bouquet. Darauf bezüglich Wahl Herkunftslandes Wert gelegt, Sortiment bewusst knapp gehalten. Aufgrund Lieferengpässen Ernteausfällen Ausnahmefällen Land gewechselt werden. Als Trägeröl bieten Jojobaöl an. Shipping costs Shipping time: 3-7 working days* Origin: Australia Type of product: Essential oil from controlled organic crops Description: Tea tree oil is very well known due to its typical strong, herbaceous spicy fragrance. It leaves pure refreshing feeling and stimulates concentration. Note: These are volatile, highly concentrated oily substances obtained by different procedures e.g. water steam distillation or cold-pressing, from different plant elements. They are mostly clear and after having volatilized (except after cold-pressing) normally do not leave any visible traces. The products offered by Biofrid® are of high quality whose ingredients originate from controlled organic crops and contain 100% essential oil. Essential oils must be used very sparingly and consciously. They serve to fill room as well as improving the surrounding air with pleasant fragrance. Undiluted they must not come into contact with skin or mucous membranes, as this could cause irritation. Special caution must be exercised during pregnancy and the presence of children. Due to the numerous fragrances contained only one plant, genuine essential oils have very full bouquet to which great importance is attached regarding choice of the country of origin, and this is why the range is limited. In exceptional cases the supplier country is changed, e.g. where cases of supply shortage or crop failure could occur. Right of revocation - Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG Herstellung Vertrieb diätetischen, kosmetischen pharmazeutischen Produkten » Home Login / Register | Your account | Shopping Cart | Cash box Search Literature Products Cosmetics Dietary Supplement Essential/fatty oils Shipping & Returns Privacy Notice General terms and conditions Imprint Contact Right of revocation Standard withdrawal form Newsletter Biofrid Cosmetic GmbH & Co.KG Hasseler Steinweg 9 27318 Hoya Postfach 1355 27316 Hoya Telefon 04251 9352-396 Telefax 04251 9352-290 Social Bookmarks Right of revocation Consumers are entitled to right of withdrawal according to the following conditions, wherein the consumer is defined as every natural person entering into legal transaction for purpose attributed neither to commercial nor self-employed occupational activity: Returns policy Right of revocation Right of withdrawal You have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days, without stating any reasons. The withdrawal period is fourteen days beginning the day on which you or third party designated by you, other than the carrier, have/has taken possession of the goods. In order to exercise your right of withdrawal, you have to notify us - Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG, Hasseler Steinweg 9, 27318 Hoya; Tel.: 04251/9352-395; Fax: 04251/9352-290; info@biofrid.de - by way of explicit declaration (e.g. letter sent by post, fax or e-mail) of your decision to withdraw from this contract. To this end you may use the attached standard withdrawal form, though this is not required. You may fill and submit the standard withdrawal form, or any other explicit declaration, electronically on our website www.mastavit.de. If you make use of this option, we communicate (e.g. via e-mail) acknowledgement of receipt of such withdrawal without delay. To observe the withdrawal period it is sufficient, if you send off the notice regarding the exercising of the right of withdrawal before the expiry of the withdrawal period. Consequences of the withdrawal If you withdraw from this contract, we reimburse all payments we have received from you including shipping charges (with the exception of additional charges which result from your choosing shipping method different from the cheapest standard shipping method offered by us), without delay and no later than fourteen days from the day that the notice of your withdrawal from this contract received by us. For this refund, we use the same payment method which used by you the original transaction, unless we explicitly made other arrangements with you. In no case you be charged any fees for this refund. We may refuse the reimbursement until we have received back the goods or until you have provided proof that the goods have been sent, depending on which ever occurs first. The goods must be returned to us without delay and any case no later fourteen days after the date that you notified us of your withdrawal from this contract. To observe this deadline, the goods must be sent off before the expiry of the fourteen day period. You shall bear the immediate cost for the returning of the goods. You shall only be liable for any diminished value of the goods resulting from the handling other than what is necessary order to ascertain the nature, characteristics and functioning of the goods. End of the revocation notice Exclusion of the right of revocation The right of revocation does not apply to distance sales contracts on the delivery of audio or video recordings or of software, if you have unsealed the delivered data medium. General remarks 1. Please avoid damaging or soiling of the goods. Please return the goods to us, if possible, their entire original packaging and together with all accessories. Use, if necessary, protective outer packaging. Should you not have the original packaging at your disposal any more, please use appropriate packaging to protect the goods against transport damages. 2. Please note that the aforementioned clause 1 do not constitute requirement for the effective exercise of your right of revocation. Print this page Standard withdrawal form (If you wish to withdraw from the contract, please fill out this form and send it back.) - To Biofrid-Cosmetic GmbH & Co. KG, Managing Directors: Reiner Kehlbeck, Heinfried Kehlbeck, Natascha Kehlbeck, Martin Stannat, Hasseler Steinweg 9, 27318 Hoya, Fax: +49(0)4251/9352-290, e-mail: info@biofrid.de - I/We(*) hereby give notice that I/We (*) withdraw from my/our (*) contract of sale of the following goods (*)/provision of the following service (*). - Ordered on (*)/ received on (*) - Name of consumer(s) - Address of consumer(s) - Signature of consumer(s) (only case of paper version) - Date (*) Delete as appropriate Powered by First-Web * Gilt für Lieferungen Deutschland. By placing his order, the customer submits offer within the meaning of §145 German Civil Code (BGB, Bürgerliches Gesetzbuch). The customer receive email confirming receipt of the order. If necessary, we inform the customer about potential errors the specifications of the product range on our website and present corresponding counteroffer to the customer. The customer waives the receipt of declaration of acceptance, §141 para. 1 German Civil Code. The contract with us is concluded, if we accept the offer of the customer within 10 days writing or text form or deliver the ordered goods, or if the customer pays advance. In the case of advance payment, we declare acceptance of the contract upon the customer’s advance payment, if this payment is made within 10 days of placing the order. § 3 Bearing of the shipping costs if the right of withdrawal is exercised: If the right of withdrawal is exercised, we reimburse all payments we have received from you including shipping charges (with the exception of additional charges which result from your choosing shipping method different from the cheapest standard shipping method offered by us), without delay and no later than fourteen days from the day that the notice of your withdrawal from this contract received by us. For this refund, we use the same payment method which used by you the original transaction, unless we explicitly made other arrangements with you. In no case you be charged any fees for this refund. We may refuse the reimbursement until we have received back the goods or until you have provided proof that the goods have been sent, depending on which ever occurs first. You shall bear the immediate cost for the returning of the goods. § 4 Delivery, Delivery costs, Risk transfer The goods are shipped at the delivery costs listed for each individual case. Provided that the customer is consumer, we bear the shipping risk regardless of the mode of shipment any case. If the customer is business, all risks and dangers of shipment are transferred to the customer, as soon as we have handed over the goods to the assigned forwarding agent. § 5 Retention of Title The delivered goods shall remain our property until full payment of the purchase price has been received. § 6 Warranty Warranty is subject to the legal regulations. § 7 Consumer information regarding distance sales contracts on the purchase of goods We are not subject to special and not aforementioned codes of conduct. Any input errors your order can be detected at the final confirmation before check-out and corrected at any time by means of the deleting and changing feature before final placement of the order. For the essential characteristics of the products presented by us as well as the period of validity for restricted offers, please refer to the individual product descriptions on our web site. German is the exclusive language offered for the conclusion of the contract. Complaints and warranty claims can be submitted to the address as stated at supplier information. To print the contract text, please use the print function of your browser. The contract text is not available to customers for orders our web shop. Further, the contract text is saved by us. For information on payment, delivery or fulfillment, please refer to the offer itself. After conclusion of the contract, you receive automatic e-mail containing further information on the processing of the contract. The e-mail comprises order number, which has to be quoted the bank transfer of the invoice amount due. As rule, this order number not correspond to the invoice number. § 8 Miscellaneous The contractual relationships with the customer as well as the respective general terms and conditions are governed exclusively by the law of the Federal Republic of Germany. Provided that the customer is consumer, the valid legal provisions and rights the country of residence of the customer existing favour of the consumer not be affected or impaired by this agreement. Application of the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods (CISG) is excluded. The exclusive place of jurisdiction is the court of our place of business if the customer is merchant the sense of the German Commercial Code or corporation under public law. We are entitled to take action at the court of the customer. § 9 Severability Clause If individual clauses of this contract are or become totally or partially invalid, this not affect the validity of the remaining parts of the contract.
